name: Four Lights
storyline:
urban Fantasy Romance "Four Lights"
I am lost in time and turned my back
on the world with the angel.
Four lights are 'Kinetic Novels.'
"The more you care about someone,
the more unfortunate they will be."
The last generation that the prophecy of god comes true.
Lucifer and the Dreamp corps that have conquered the entire world
are trying to fall the children of gods into despair,
hiding the truth of the world.
summary: "Four Light" by Visual Novel, urban fantasy RomanceA world where humans use superpowers all over the world.The stage is a story that takes place in the fictional city of Gaon City in modern times (about 2020).
